name: RISR
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50

Content warning: cults, capitalism

RISR is a simple concept: what if the company that built a snooze button for your alarm was a megacorp run by a sociopath with a god complex? 

Requires a QWERTY keyboard to play 

Note; It turns out keyboards are fickle creatures that don't like certain letter combinations being held down. if you have an expensive keyboard, you'll probably have a slightly smoother experience however it shouldn't make or break the game.

A patched version has been added - the only change vs the original is the camera scaling on one scene has been fixed. if you would like to play the more busted version it's now downloadable.
